pages.text:
Weddings & EVENTS
Welcome to Martin Downs Golf Club and Resort – where the perfect event experience awaits you.
Our picturesque venue is the ideal setting for
Weddings, Anniversaries, Birthdays, Baby Showers, Graduation Parties, Retirement Celebrations, Corporate Events, Holiday Gatherings and Other Events.
With our attention to detail, professional staff, and customized menus from our executive chef, your event will be a true masterpiece.
Whether you're planning a small and intimate event or a grand celebration, we have the perfect space to fit your needs.
Our beautifully appointed event spaces can accommodate groups of any size, from a cozy gathering of family and friends to a lavish wedding reception.
Our team of experienced event coordinators will work with you every step of the way to create a memorable occasion that perfectly reflects your style and vision.
Our attention to detail sets us apart. From the moment you contact us, we will work tirelessly to ensure that your event is flawless.
Our professional staff is dedicated to providing exceptional service, and we take pride in going above and beyond to exceed your expectations.
One of the highlights of hosting your event at Martin Downs Golf Club and Resort is our executive chef and his team.
They will work with you to create a customized menu that perfectly complements your event.
From elegant hors d'oeuvres to sumptuous entrees and decadent desserts, our culinary team will impress your guests with their creativity and attention to detail.
At Martin Downs Golf Club and Resort, we understand that your event is special, and we are committed to making it unforgettable.
Contact us today to learn more about our event spaces and services.
Let us help you create lasting memories that you and your guests will treasure for years to come.
Booking or Quote Form
Thank you for considering Martin Downs Golf Club and Resort for your upcoming event. To help us better understand your needs and preferences, please fill out the following form. Once we receive your information, one of our experienced event coordinators will be in touch to discuss your event in further detail and provide a personalized quote.
Please provide us with the following information:
Name
Email
Phone
Approximate number of guests
Additional information
Type Of Event *
Please Select
Wedding
Anniversary
Birthday
Baby Shower
Graduation Party
Retirement Celebration
Corporate Event
Holiday Gathering
>

Summer Program

Full Membership FAMILY: $5,000 (pre-season) or $6,000 (starting Nov 1st)
Unlimited golf including green and cart fees
10% off restaurant, pro shop, and spa (not included with already discounted items)
14 day advance tee times
Full Membership SINGLE: $4,000 (pre-season) or $5,000 (starting Nov 1st)
Minimum of 6 players
Unlimited golf including green and cart fees
10% off restaurant, pro shop, and spa (not included with already discounted items)
14 day advance tee times
Corporate Membership: $3,000 (pre-season) or $4,000 (starting Nov 1st)
$20 fee per round applies
10% off restaurant, pro shop, and spa (not included with already discounted items)
Full access to Clubhouse/Meeting, Conference, and Card Rooms
Social Cards: $300 (pre-season) or $350 (starting Nov 1st)
Does not pertain to any other day but THURSDAY
Greens fee: $30 (18 holes) or $20 (9 holes)
10% off restaurant, pro shop, and spa (not included with already discounted items)
Card room privileges included
LADIES DAY One Day Membership: $300 (pre-season) or $350 (starting Nov 1st)
10% off merchandise in pro shop
Full access to Clubhouse/Meeting, Conference, and Card Rooms
Seasonal Membership: $4,000 (starting Nov 1st)

Memberships – 772-286-6818

Weddings and Events – 772-286-6818

Directions from Palm Beach Int’l Airport:
From PBI, Start out going east on Turnage Blvd toward Perimeter Rd then Merge onto I-95 N toward W Palm Bch. Go into SW High Meadow Ave/County Hwy-713 via EXIT 102 toward County Hwy-713.Take left at SW Martin Downs Blvd/FL-714 then Turn left onto Sandhill Rd. Finally Turn right onto SW Greenwood Way to reach gate.

lifestyle
Experience southern florida
Martin Downs embodies the
        traditions and style of living that are exclusively experienced in Southern Florida.
Craft your own
        experiences through our offerings below.
Health & Wellness
We believe the sport of golf should be a
                sport accesible to anyone, regardless of ability or age.
Weddings & Events
Lush Floridian scenery, a warm climate,
                and picturesque landscapes. Book your special event today.
Fine Dining
From local recipes to world-renowned
                dishes, experience the best of South Floridian cuisine.
